ConditionDescription: IT IS PERFECT! VERY BEAUTIFUL! THERE ARE SO MANY RHINESTONES, IT CAN'T HELP BUT SPARKLE!!
Title: KIRKS FOLLY VINTAGE/RARE/SIGNED "HEARTS & ANGELS BRACELET" GOLDTONE-GREAT SPARKL
Description: KIRKS FOLLY...VINTAGE/RARE/SIGNED "7 CHERUBS WITH 5 HEARTS CHARM BRACELET" ...Whether or not you are a Kirks Folly collector, this is a wonderful bracelet for the serious collector OR the beginner! There are several charms of different cherubs and hearts with wonderful details. In between the charms are more wonderful rhinestones for that "extra" sparkle! Very nice heavy duty chain with a lobster clasp! It measures is 7-1/4" with an extender of 1-3/4" long if you need to wear it larger. It also has the Kirks Folly logo tag at the lobster clasp and again on the inside of one of the cherubs. The gorgeous finish is all gold tone.
